price: 97. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: Tag oo naga fagow! Waxaa kuu sugnaaday noloshan inaad tidhaahdo: "Taabasho ma jirto (waa lay gooyey si dhan)"19, waxaa kaloo  leedahay ballan aad dib uga dhici doonin (oo ah cadaabka Aakhiro). Eegna ilaah ku sheeggaagii aad in door ah dul joogtay ee aad caabudaysay. Waanu gubi (oo aanu ka dhigi dambas) aanu badda ku firdhinno oo waxba aanu ka hari doonin.’
arabic: قَالَ فَٱذۡهَبۡ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوۡعِدٗا لَّن تُخۡلَفَهُۥۖ وَٱنظُرۡ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِي ظَلۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ عَاكِفٗاۖ لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ نَسۡفًا
footnotes: 19. “ Ha i taabaannina” waa ciqaab ahaan adduunka, waayo waxaa la amray inay dadku u gooyaan si dhan oo waxba ku darsan. Aakhirona waxaa sugaya Naar olol badan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla fa-idh'hab fa-inna laka fī al-ḥayati an taqūla lā misāsa wa-inna laka mawʿidan lan tukh'lafahu wa-unẓur ilā ilāhika alladhī ẓalta ʿalayhi ʿākifan lanuḥarriqannahu thumma lanansifannahu fī al-yami nasfan
